content: In what 1994 film does Tom Hanks play the title character, who tells his life story while waiting at a bus stop?

The 1994 film you're referring to is "Forrest Gump." In this movie, Tom Hanks plays the titular character, Forrest Gump, who narrates his life story while waiting at a bus stop. The film is known for its unique storytelling and Hanks' portrayal of the kind-hearted yet simple-minded protagonist.
